title: Any idea about when college may start?
content:
Most of my friends have already started going to college and the rest of them have an idea about when exactly their college is gonna start.
I've been sitting, absolutely bored, at home for the past 3 months now and I'm sure I'm gonna lose my mind if I continue to do so. (Too broke to spend money and go out with my friends)
The administration has told that college will start in July, but not given a particular date.
Anyone who may have an idea about this,
PLEASE enlighten me🙏

comments.body:
August 1st week
Which clgs have already started bruh
There are many ways to make yourself productive. Search this sub, I've posted about what to do before entering first year.
(non-engineering clgs)
Christ, SJCC, idk about SJU, MCC is gonna start in the first week of July, Claret starts on first of July😭
Thank you so much😭🙏✨️
where have u posted ???
Check the FAQs. There's a list of things to do if you're in CS. Also a do's and don'ts for first years.
For engineering?
Non engineering (law student🙏🙏)
Okkk
Enjoy dude till college starts
I'm trying, but since most of my friends have already started with their college, I'm alone lmaooo😭
i am a law student too and i’m so bored waiting for uni to start😭🙏

Yesss
BA LLB?
yeahh sameee!!
That's coollll
Can you do one for ECE also? How do I prepare for the first year if I'm an ECE student
the previous batch , ie my batch the college started on 17th sept 2024
Engineering?
I wasn't in ECE. Maybe you can look into MIT Missing Semester, but for specific advice I would suggest asking on the discord server.
Okay thanks
Buddy you will be engineer in future so aadat daal le bore hone ki
Yeah
Par Mai toh Law student hoon😭😭
Tab toh aur patience rakh na aagle chalke court mae taarekh pe taarekh milegi
Haan but kaam toh chalta rahega na, abhi toh I'm sitting literally jobless at home😭😭
Well I'm a law student too, (BA LLB Hons). As far as ik it's most prolly gonna start in the 2nd week of July.

That's cool, thanks for letting me knowww
Hoping to see you around😆😆
